    @staticmethod
    def compare_samples_swab_rinse_surface_area_bioburden_summary(data):
        sheet_name = data["external_id"] + "_samples_custom"
        sample_area = Excel.read_excel_columns_name_row_value(const.get_master_data(), sheet_name, data["columns"],
                                                              data["sample_type"])
        sample_area_list = [item for item in sample_area["Sampling area(sqcm)"] if item != '#VALUE!']
        result_list = [item for item in sample_area["rinse_volume"] if item != '#VALUE!']
        sample_ids = [item for item in sample_area["sample id"] if item != '#VALUE!']
        swab_area_mapping = dict(zip(sample_ids, sample_area_list))
        rinse_vol_mapping = dict(zip(sample_ids, result_list))
        for profile in data['sample_profile']['samplingProfiles'][data["eq_length"]]['samplingProfile'].values():
            for sample in profile['samples'].values():
                sample_id = sample.get('externalId')
                if sample.get('type') == data["type"] and sample_id in sample_ids:
                    surface_area = sample.get('surfaceArea')
                    rinse_volume = sample.get('rinseVolume')
                    if surface_area is not None:
                        assert round(surface_area, 3) == round(swab_area_mapping[sample_id], 3), \

                             f"{swab_area_mapping[sample_id]} for sample id {sample_id}")
